nodes.text: A Wistie was part of a group owned by Gardulla Besadii the Elder and transported to Tatooine. There, the Wistie child was released into a garden to serve as illumination. The Wistie and the others of her kind joined up with a group of Ghostlings that were hiding from the Hutt. This Wistie served as a lookout for bounty hunters or other thugs that were pursuing the escaped slaves.
